reviews.review_msg: I really enjoyed taking Environmental Ethics with him! He is a great prof and is very supportive towards his students. The workload was fair and not too demanding at all. Just make sure you take good notes in class because he goes over all the readings in depth. Overall, I would recommend taking a class with him :)

Nice guy. This was a good class to take online, I like the way things were laid out. Simon was super compassionate to my class, it seemed like everyone was struggling a bit this semester with life stuff. I would take another class with Dr Pollon, he was a tough but fair grader. Not hard to pass this class, but requires effort to get a good grade
